entry.title: Blue Razz Protein Slushie
entry.content:
Protein slushies? Yes you heard us right. Protein. Slushies. Need we say more? Grab your favorite flavor of our Clear Whey Isolate Protein and follow the instructions below!

Cook Time: 10 minutes

Servings: 1

INGREDIENTS:

  • 1 scoop of SEEQ Blue Razz Freeze Clear Protein (or your favorite flavor)
  • 6.5 oz of water
  • Handful of crushed ice
  • Fruit to garnish (optional)

INSTRUCTIONS:

  1. Start by adding 6.5 oz of water and 1 scoop of your favorite flavor of SEEQ Clear Whey Isolate Protein to a blender bottle.
  2. Shake the blender bottle gently to mix the ingredients together. Do not blend the mixture yet.
  3. Add a handful of ice to a blender and blend it until all the ice is shaved and crushed.
  4. Pour the clear protein mixture from the blender bottle on top of the ice in the blender.
  5. Use a spoon to gently mix the protein mixture with the ice until it's well combined and has a slushie-like consistency.
  6. Pour the Protein Slushie into a glass and garnish with your favorite fruit or other toppings, if desired.
  7. Enjoy your delicious and protein-packed Protein Slushie!

 

TIPS & TRICKS:

  • Like your slushie a little thicker? Easy. Just add extra ice to your blender. We recommend blending a little longer than normal to make sure that all of the larger chunks of ice blend well. 
  • Needing some extra protein to get through the day? This is your permission to add an extra scoop to your protein slush. Not only will you get extra protein but it will also but bursting with flavor. You really can not go wrong in this situation.

entry.title: Protein Jello
entry.content:
Looking for a fun way to incorporate more protein into your diet? Look no further than Protein Jello! This delicious and easy-to-make recipe is not only a great way to boost your protein intake, but it's also a fun and refreshing treat that the whole family will enjoy. And with SEEQ's best-tasting protein powders, you can be sure that your Protein Jello will taste great too! So if you're looking for a new and delicious way to get your daily dose of protein, give this Protein Jello recipe a try.

 

Cook Time: 4 hours

Servings: 1

INGREDIENTS:

  • 1 scoop of SEEQ Blue Razz Freeze Protein (or your favorite flavor)
  • 8 oz of cold water
  • 8 oz of boiling water
  • 2 envelopes of gelatin (1/2 oz) or 1 package of any flavored jello mix

INSTRUCTIONS:

  1. Combine cold water and 1 scoop of your favorite SEEQ Clear Whey Protein flavor in a shaker and shake thoroughly.
  2. Pour 8 oz of boiling water into a heat-proof dish or large heat-proof measuring cup (if you're making individual Jello servings).
  3. Add the gelatin to the boiling water and stir until dissolved.
  4. Strain your SEEQ protein into the gelatin mixture and stir gently.
  5. Place dish into the fridge or, if making individual servings, slowly pour the mixture into glasses.
  6. Refrigerate for 4 hours or until set

 

TIPS & TRICKS:

  • If you are looking to up your protein intake even more and go from 22 grams of protein to 39 grams of protein — use beef gelatin in place of regular gelatin. Not only are you going to be benefiting from the extra protein but beef gelatin is also packed with collagen!
  • To make your jello a little more spunky and fun, don’t be afraid of using jello molds. Search Amazon or even your nearest store to find some fun molds that awaken your inner kid just like when you opened up your lunchbox. 
  • To get in your daily fruit servings, try adding some cut up fruit into your jello molds for delightful added flavor and nutrition.
